original: Ellison, Carl Lennart, direktör, leg. apotekare, Norrköping, f. 22/9/15 i Borg, östergötl. 1., av disp. Elis E. o. Ruith Bohtlin. G. 41 m. Gun>nie(l An-dersén. Barn: Bengt f. 43, Marianne 46. — Stud :ex. i Norrköp. 34, farm. kand. 38, hand:- o. språkstud. samt rev:byråprakt. 39-40, apot:ex. 43. Stud:res. t. Danm. o. Engl. 45. Elev v. apot. Kronan i Norrköp. 34-37, kand:tjg. v. apot. Svanen i Norrköp. 38 o. v. apot. i Mjölby 40-41, laborant v. Svanen i Norrköp. 43-44. Kamr. i A-B Manus i Norrköp. 40, dir:assist. där fr. 44 samt v. verkst. dir. där sed. 46. Led. av styr. f. A-B Manus i Norrköp. sed. 38 o. Upsala Separator A-B där sed. 45. Värnpl. fänrik fr. 40 m. tjg. bl. a. v. krigssjukh. på Gotl.
translated: Ellison, Carl Lennart, director, licensed pharmacist, Norrköping, b. September 22, 1915 in Borg, Östergötland. Son of Elis E. and Ruith Bohtlin. Married in 1941 to Gunnie(l Andersén). Children: Bengt b. 1943, Marianne b. 1946. Education: studied in Norrköping, passed pharmacy exams in 1934, received a pharmaceutical degree in 1938, completed business and language studies and worked in an accounting firm from 1939 to 1940, received a pharmacy degree in 1943. Studied abroad in Denmark and England in 1945. Worked as a trainee at Apoteket Kronan in Norrköping from 1934 to 1937, assistant pharmacist at Apoteket Svanen in Norrköping in 1938, and pharmacist at Apoteket in Mjölby from 1940 to 1941, laboratory assistant at Apoteket Svanen in Norrköping from 1943 to 1944. Became a chamberlain at A-B Manus in Norrköping in 1940, director's assistant from 1944, and deputy director since 1946. Has served as a board member at A-B Manus in Norrköping since 1938 and at Upsala Separator A-B since 1945. Was in military service as a second lieutenant from 1940 and served among other places in a military hospital on Gotland.

education.name: Studied abroad in Denmark and England

hasMilitaryService.name: Served in a military hospital on Gotland
